Title: Relates to decisions regarding the siting of major utility transmission facilities
Summary: Establishes when making a decision regarding the siting of major utility transmission facilities in the case of a gas transmission line the public service commission must determine whether the alternative method of using commercial vehicles for the purpose of transporting liquified natural gas poses a hazard to public safety.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to decisions regarding the siting of major utility transmission facilities
